name: TrinityMusic
0:
”Alexa, ask Trinity Music for songs in The Hunger Games”
”Alexa, ask Trinity Music for songs in Season 1, Episode 7, of Criminal Minds”
”Alexa, ask Trinity Music for songs by Coldplay”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trinity music
des:
Don't have your phone nearby or can't get a clear sample of that song you HAVE to have in the episode you're watching? Trinity Music is here to help. Built by music enthusiasts, Trinity Music was designed to simplify the process of finding new music. This is how it works (it's simple, we promise):

Say you are watching a movie or show and hear a song you love, but don't know the name of it. You want to go grab your phone and try to find it, but you don't want to distract yourself from the scene or rewind the episode to find a good part to try searching. 

With Trinity Music, there is no need to get up from your seat or rewind anything. Simply give the skill the details of what you are watching, and it will provide you with a complete list of songs and artists in your Alexa App, as well as the poster for instant reminders of your past searches.


--DEV SUPPORT--
This was conceptualized and developed by three Computer Science Students at Purdue University. While studies come first, we are dedicated to improving Trinity to the best of our ability.

Please contact trinitymusicdev@gmail.com if you have any issues and we will do our best to get back to you as soon as possible.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
